attributes.action: honestly accept that MPs are in it for themselves and not the good of the people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do these people really represent us any more or is it merelly a career with a nice house and a bulletproof pension?
At least the man at the top should have the ability to see it and the cahoonas to say it.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
